sub_title: Digital Art Director at Exo Ape — Jury Member at Awwwards
summary:
Over the past 10 years I’ve had the pleasure of art directing for global brands and inspiring companies like Marriott International, Carnival Corporation & plc, The St. Regis, Stock Dutch Design, STORD and Lo & Sons.

I have offered art direction for projects that have received 35+ awards & recognitions by multiple organisations such as The FWA, Awwwards, CSS Design Awards, Commarts, Muzli, SiteInspire, Codrops and Behance.

profile_positions.description:
We explore and push the boundaries of digital for brands and businesses that strive to enhance people's lives through exceptional experiences. Over the years, we have worked with an array of clients ranging from Interior Design to Hospitality, Travel & Tourism.

It's our philosophy that digital experiences should be captivating and focus on the essential elements that make a brand unique. We help experience-driven companies thrive by making their audience feel the refined intricacies of their brand and product in the digital space. Our data-driven approach aims to create brand advocates, resulting in increased brand loyalty, engagement, and conversions.

Unforgettable journeys start with a click.
profile_positions.title: Co-Founder & Digital Art Director
